mapper.select: select mName, sum(case when att_type = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as type1, sum(case when att_type = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as type2, sum(case when att_type = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as type3, sum(case when att_type = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as type4 from t_attend group by mName order by mName

select mName, sum(case when att_type = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as type1, sum(case when att_type = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as type2, sum(case when att_type = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as type3, sum(case when att_type = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as type4 from t_attend where att_date between to_date(#{startDate},'yyyyMMdd') and to_date(#{endDate},'yyyyMMdd') group by mName order by mName
